[docs]	def home(routes, self):
		'''Home-page.

		Args:
			self (App): ProbeDesigner.App instance.
		'''

		# Template dictionary
		d = self.vd

		# Page title and description
		d['title'] = self.tprefix + 'Home'

		# Local stylesheets
		d['custom_stylesheets'] = ['home.css']

		# Root stylesheets
		d['custom_root_stylesheets'] = []
		
		return(d)


	# Form reception -----------------------------------------------------------

	# Error --------------------------------------------------------------------

# END ==========================================================================
